content: *peter easy is a solid version of the peter 1 v-neck vest pattern berroco * skill level easy finished measurements chest 36 40-44-48-52 length 26 26 1/2 - 26 1/2 - 27 - 27 1/2 materials berroco pure merino 50 grs 10 12-13-14-16 balls #8532 brick straight knitting needles sizes 8 and 9 or size to obtain gauge 24 length circular knitting needle size 8 1 st holder 3 st markers schematic is provided 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/peter-2
